title: Kannadasan Karaikudi Lyrics Anjathe
stanzas:
kannadasan kaaraikudi
perai solli oothikudi
kunnakudi machaanai pol
paadaporendaa (2)

kannadi kopaiyila
kanna moodi neechaladi
oorugaaya thottukittaa
odi pogum kaichaladi

podhai enbadhu
oru paambu vishaamthaan
serndhu kudichaa
adhu oru socialism-thaan

pondaati pullainga
thollainga illaa idam
indha idam thaane.

indha idam illaiyina
saami madam thaane
mesthiri kalava kadanthu
kudikkiraare
siththaale ponna nenachu
idikkuraare

nooru milliya adichaa
podhai illaiye
oora thaandunaa
nadakka paadha illaiye

annanum thambiyum
ellarum inge vandhaa
dappaankuthu thaane
overaa aachuthuna
vettu kuthu thaane

engalukku thanniyila
kandamilla engalukku
jaaathi madham rendumilla
katchikaara machi
enna aachu
vaeti avundhu pochu

roatu kadaiyila
manushan jaaliya paaru
saettu kadaiyila
manaivi thaaliya paaru

kannadasan kaaraikudi
perai solli oothikudi
kunnakudi machaanai pol
paadaporendaa (2)

kannadi kopaiyila
kanna moodi neechaladi
oorugaaya thottukittaa
odi pogum kaichaladi

podhai enbadhu
oru paambu vishaamthaan
serndhu kudichaa
adhu oru socialism-thaan
